subject: Re: Order #SSN4863 confirmed
description_text:

pedals were ordered with haptic's and foot plate? Could you please confirm

Thank you.

conversations.body_text: Hi neil westwood,    We sincerely apologize for the delay caused by an oversight on the part of our warehouse staff. We will promptly resend your order. Please provide a photo showing the package you received. Thank you.

No problem, here it is.  You can see there are no haptics and no footplate.
Can you please confirm the missing items will be shipped out and could you
please use the fastest shipping method.

Thank you.
Still no update? What is happening with my missing items? Thank you.

Please could I have an update on where my missing items are? Sent a number
of messages but getting no response.

Thank you.


On Tue, 23 Dec 2025, 15:27 neil westwood, <neil.westwood1@googlemail.com>
wrote:

> No problem, here it is.  You can see there are no haptics and no
> footplate. Can you please confirm the missing items will be shipped out and
> could you please use the fastest shipping method.
>
> Thank you.
>
> On Tue, 23 Dec 2025, 10:37 service@simsonn.com,

Hi neil westwood,    I apologize for not getting back to you sooner. Here are your two replacement links.  Haptics is currently out of stock at our China warehouse as well—it's just incredibly popular. We'll be able to ship yours next Monday.  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6047195964876,SF6047195964885

Base plate has arrived. Can you please confirm if the haptics have now been
shipped and if so provide tracking number.

Many thanks.
Can you please confirm if the haptics have now been despatched. Thanks..
Hi neil westwood,  I apologize for not responding to you promptly. I see your package has been delivered. Have you received it?   https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6047195964876,SF6047195964885

Yes, I have received it.

Thank you.
Hi neil westwood,    Great to hear the good news—have fun!
